json_to_edit.voice_over: In the mist of eternity, the lighthouse stands as a beacon for those caught between worlds.
json_to_edit.description: A mysterious lighthouse guides lost souls through a treacherous fog.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, howling wind, distant fog horn
json_to_edit.name: Beacon of the Lost
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A mysterious lighthouse guides lost souls through a treacherous fog.

qa.action: The lighthouse stands tall on a rocky cliff, its beam cutting through thick fog.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the spiral staircase, his weathered hands gripping the railing.

tr.action: The lighthouse lens rotates, its prisms catching and dispersing light.

xc.action: Marina's spectral form glides across the rocky shore, beckoning to something in the mist.

ka.action: Through the Lost Sailor's eyes, we see the lighthouse beam piercing the fog, offering hope.

fn.action: The Siren emerges from the waves, her enchanting voice carrying on the wind.

af.action: Captain Elias and Marina move along the cliffside, searching for the source of a distant cry.

qo.action: The lighthouse stands as a solitary guardian, surrounded by swirling mists and turbulent seas.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every two existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: In the mist of eternity, the lighthouse stands as a beacon for those caught between worlds.
updated_json.description: A mysterious lighthouse guides lost souls through a treacherous fog.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Crashing waves, howling wind, distant fog horn

updated_json.scene_summary: A mysterious lighthouse guides lost souls through a treacherous fog.

qa.action: The lighthouse stands tall on a rocky cliff, its beam cutting through thick fog.

hf.action: Captain Elias climbs the spiral staircase, his weathered hands gripping the railing.

zy.action: The lighthouse's ancient gears turn slowly, powering the massive lens above.

tr.action: The lighthouse lens rotates, its prisms catching and dispersing light.

xc.action: Marina's spectral form glides across the rocky shore, beckoning to something in the mist.

wx.action: The Lost Sailor's eyes widen in fear and hope as he spots the lighthouse beam.

ka.action: Through the Lost Sailor's eyes, we see the lighthouse beam piercing the fog, offering hope.

fn.action: The Siren emerges from the waves, her enchanting voice carrying on the wind.

uv.action: The world tilts as the Siren's song affects the Lost Sailor, the lighthouse beam wavering in his vision.

af.action: Captain Elias and Marina move along the cliffside, searching for the source of a distant cry.

qo.action: The lighthouse stands as a solitary guardian, surrounded by swirling mists and turbulent seas.

rs.action: Time seems to slow as Marina reaches out to the Lost Sailor, her ghostly hand nearing his mortal form.

label.rationale: we will add new shots after every two existing shots in the scene, as requested by the edit command. this will increase the total number of shots from 8 to 12. we'll create four new shots that fit the scene's atmosphere and continue the narrative flow. we'll update the list_display_order and add new shot entries to the "shots" dictionary. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total. the new shots will be creative and consistent with the existing scene's mood and story.

value.action: The lighthouse's ancient gears turn slowly, powering the massive lens above.
The Lost Sailor's eyes widen in fear and hope as he spots the lighthouse beam.
The world tilts as the Siren's song affects the Lost Sailor, the lighthouse beam wavering in his vision.
Time seems to slow as Marina reaches out to the Lost Sailor, her ghostly hand nearing his mortal form.
